physics
Class SatelliteLaunch

java.lang.Object
  physics.SatelliteLaunch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class SatelliteLaunch
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game

A simulation where you launch a satellite from earth.
The user specifies values for initial velocity, angle, and mass.
Satellites are drawn to the screen to show if the values make for a successful orbit.

Author:
Mike Facelle

Constant Field Values

PPM

public static float PPM
Number of pixels per meter (ppm).
10^-4 is used to scale 6.4E6 (R_EARTH) to 640 pixels (screen width). The mantissa is used to scale how many earth radii can be displayed on the screen

public void inputMode(int mode)
